# The `IPDBSourceFile` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pdb/ipdbsourcefile">IPDBSourceFile</a> defines an interface used to represent source files whose information are stored in the PDB. <a href="#details">More...</a>
